entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS AROUND 90
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
